name: Crochet Snowball Pattern
description:
*** DIGITAL PATTERN DOWNLOAD ***
Bring the magic of winter indoors with these crocheted snowballs!
This is not a physical item. After purchasing, you will receive a PDF for this beginner-friendly crochet snowball pattern.

name: Crochet Headband Pattern
description:
*** DIGITAL PATTERN DOWNLOAD ***
This is not a physical item. It is a crochet pattern for a baby headband. It includes 4 size alterations (0-3 months, 3-6 months, 6-12 months, and 12-24 months).

name: Sour Gummy Worm Plushies
description:
Packages include either one worm (your choice of color), a bundle of 3, a bundle of 6, or a bundle of 8 (combinations displayed in photos). A bag will be included for bundles of 3+ worms.
Each worm is about 4 inches long.
Pattern by EJCrochetandPatterns.
***All items are handmade so they may vary slightly***
Include pipe cleaners inside to allow them to change positions/bend!

name: Crochet Gummy Bear
description:
This listing is for a single gummy bear.
Approx. 2 by 1.25 inches.
All orders of 3+ gummy bears will receive a bag with the order as shown in the picture.
Pattern by Endmade.Crochet on TikTok.
***Each item is handmade so they may vary slightly***
